doc:
Oscar Levant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_Levant 0 Oscar Levant (December 27, 1906 – August 14, 1972) was an American concert pianist, composer, music conductor, bestselling author, radio game show panelist and personality, television talk show host, and actor. He was as famous for his mordant character and witticisms, on the radio and in movies and television, as for his music. Oscar_Levant ( December_27_,_1906 – August_14_,_1972 ) was an_American_concert_pianist , composer , music_conductor , bestselling author , radio_game show panelist_and_personality_,_television_talk_show_host , and actor . He was as_famous for his_mordant_character_and_witticisms , on the_radio and in movies_and_television , as for his_music .
